RTCRtpReceiverGetSynchronizationSources.summary:
The getSynchronizationSources()
method of the interface returns an array of
instances, each corresponding to one SSRC
(synchronization source) identifier received by the current
RTCRtpReceiver in the last ten seconds.
RTCRtpReceiverGetSynchronizationSources.returns: An array of object describing one of the synchronization sources that provided data to the incoming stream in the past ten seconds. These objects contain the following properties:
